name: Line Sequence: Full
description:
A Paid game without ADS and IAP...

Be the first player to put three identical pieces in a row. Seems simple? There's only one problem: your opponent can change your pieces and use them against you!

It's like Tic-tac-toe...... but much harder!! Play against AI or another person, or watch AI play itself.

The game is played in turns. You can play against AI or against another person.

If it is your turn, tap an empty square to place a new piece or tap any existing piece to upgrade it.

You may tap more than once, but each turn you may change only one square.

TIP: You can also change your opponent's pieces! When you're done making your move, tap "Next Turn" or submit your move.

Features include :-

1) Simple and polished UI
2) Addictive gameplay
3) Cool music and sound effects
4) View the number of rounds a player won
5) Multiple themes to choose from (More to be added soon)
6) Nice animation
7) Play with your friend or test your skills against AI
8) You can change Sound effects setting anytime
9) No IAP, universal game and awesome gameplay!

Try it yourself!!
